name: Where is the Witch?
description:
Oh no! How did you get in this basement? And doesn’t it look a bit…familiar? There sure are a lot of wild rumours about this old house. Monsters. An old witch. And mysterious clacking noises coming from deep inside. Here’s hoping that those rumours aren’t true, but just in case, you’d better find your way out of here, quick!

From “The Raging Dreamers” comes this puzzle platformer where you need to throw dice around to solve all your problems! 

The Raging Dreamers

Zia Reynolds – Project Lead

Aya – Game Design Lead

Powercore2000 – Programming Lead

Kemtimus Sign – Art Lead

Danielle K – Art

Andrej – Art

Ricardo M – Design & Programming

Harry Petch – Support Programming
